android.car.app

类 CarTaskViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.app.CarTaskViewController

  • public final class CarTaskViewController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for creating task views & is created on a per activity basis.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法

    • 方法详细资料

      • createControlledRemoteCarTaskView

        public void createControlledRemoteCarTaskView(ControlledRemoteCarTaskViewConfig controlledRemoteCarTaskViewConfig,
                                              java.util.concurrent.Executor callbackExecutor,
                                              ControlledRemoteCarTaskViewCallback controlledRemoteCarTaskViewCallback)
        Creates a new ControlledRemoteCarTaskView.
        参数:
        callbackExecutor - the executor to get the ControlledRemoteCarTaskViewCallback on.
        controlledRemoteCarTaskViewCallback - the callback to monitor the ControlledRemoteCarTaskView related events.

      • createRemoteCarRootTaskView

        public void createRemoteCarRootTaskView(RemoteCarRootTaskViewConfig remoteCarRootTaskViewConfig,
                                        java.util.concurrent.Executor callbackExecutor,
                                        RemoteCarRootTaskViewCallback remoteCarRootTaskViewCallback)
        Creates a new RemoteCarRootTaskView.
        参数:
        callbackExecutor - the executor to get the RemoteCarRootTaskViewCallback on.
        remoteCarRootTaskViewCallback - the callback to monitor the RemoteCarRootTaskView related events.

      • createRemoteCarDefaultRootTaskView

        public void createRemoteCarDefaultRootTaskView(RemoteCarDefaultRootTaskViewConfig remoteCarDefaultRootTaskViewConfig,
                                               java.util.concurrent.Executor callbackExecutor,
                                               RemoteCarDefaultRootTaskViewCallback remoteCarDefaultRootTaskViewCallback)
        Creates a new RemoteCarDefaultRootTaskView.
        参数:
        callbackExecutor - the executor to get the RemoteCarDefaultRootTaskViewCallback on.
        remoteCarDefaultRootTaskViewCallback - the callback to monitor the RemoteCarDefaultRootTaskView related events.

      • release

        public void release()
        Releases all the resources held by the taskviews associated with this controller.

        Once release() is called, the current instance of CarTaskViewController cannot be used further. A new instance should be requested using CarActivityManager.getCarTaskViewController(Activity, Executor, CarTaskViewControllerCallback).

      • showEmbeddedTasks

        public void showEmbeddedTasks()
        Brings all the embedded tasks to the front.
